testcase.name: Testing if user can search for Hotels - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given browser is launched...................................................passed And Adactin Hotel build two "https://adactinhotelapp.com/HotelAppBuild2/index.php" is open.passed Then verify login page is open and it is build two..........................passed When user enters SpheleleZ and Nok2lasphe...................................passed And chick on login button...................................................passed Then verify user logged in successfully.....................................passed And select the Melbourne and Hotel Sunshine.................................passed And select room Double and number of 2......................................passed When enters check in 14/02/2024 and check out 24/02/2024....................passed And select how many Adults per room 3 and Children per room 2...............passed And click on search button..................................................passed Then verify if list of Hotels or Hotel is displayed.........................passed And close the browser.......................................................passed
